animeTitle: Dragon Ball Z Movie 10 – Broly: Second Coming
otherNames: Dragon Ball Z Movie 10: Kiken Na Futari! Super Senshi Wa Nemurenai, Dragon Ball Z: Dangerous Rivals, Dragon Ball Z: Dangerous Partners! Super Warriors Never Rest, Dragon Ball Z: Kiken Na Futari! Super Senshi Wa Nemurenai, ドラゴンボールZ 危険なふたり! 超戦士はねむれない
synopsis:
After his loss to Goku, Brolly crash lands and hibernates on earth. After some time, he is awakened by Trunks and Goten, who Brolly believes is Kakarott, and goes on a rampage to kill both of them. At the same time, Gohan is on his way to challenge the Legendary Super Saiyan alone.
Read more at http://myanimelist.net/anime/903/Dragon_Ball_Z_Movie_10:_Kiken_na_Futari!_Super_Senshi_wa_Nemurenai#LedzPEjHEahtbr0R.99
